From now until New Years Day I'm opening up the following offer to LowEndTalk readers:  
  
**5GB SAS 15K SAN Disk
256MB RAM
200GB Bandwidth
£4.50 per month**
  
The platform is running a fully redundant hardware SAN setup with all SAS 15K disks and dual E5620 processors across the hypervisors. The entire platform is Xen-based and managed by OnApp. More information, including speed test files etc., is of course on the [website](http://www.theukcloud.com) and [wiki](http://ukcloud.atlassian.net/) but I wanted to emphasise what's really special about this offer, our unique "Zero Downtime or Zero Invoice" guarantee.  
  
Essentially this is a way to pick up a high-end cloud server at a reduced price. The specs are fairly low but if you need something that's powerful and reliable then this is for you.  
  
If you have any questions just reply to this thread, email, telephone or live chat us. 

[Order Link](https://www.theukcloud.com/order/?vps=LOWENDTALK-XMAS&msl=0&location=uk)

Please remember that we are beta testing with a reduced setup at the moment, so it's important to keep a backup of your data.

**NEW! Free automated daily, weekly and monthly backups to NAS**
**NEW! Order cPanel (£8) and get FREE Fantastico and FREE WHMXtra**

Offer is limited to one per customer, new orders only.
